attributes.action: instruct that all cases of child maintenance dealt with under the 'old rules' be changed to the fairer 'new rules' system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Child maintenance arranged under the 'old rules' by the CSA uses a complex and often unfair formula.

It punishes fathers who pay maintenance.

The 'new rules' are a more fair and transparent system for working out maintenance payments.

All cases should be changed to the 'new rules' ASAP.
